verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] expected to unveil his administration 's plan to lower drug prices in a speech Friday afternoon .
[ARG1: President Trump] is [V: expected] [C-ARG1: to unveil his administration 's plan to lower drug prices in a speech Friday afternoon] .
[ARG0: President Trump] is expected to [V: unveil] [ARG1: his administration 's plan to lower drug prices] [ARGM-LOC: in a speech] [ARGM-TMP: Friday afternoon] .
President Trump is expected to unveil his administration 's plan to [V: lower] [ARG1: drug prices] in a speech Friday afternoon .
